summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 20, Osner's 2nd Addition, as established by Ordinance No. 43978, being the alley between Greenwood Avenue and Dayton Avenue, from North 84th Street to North 85th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 118055 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
